description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Cold, Fire

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 3d8+5 cold and fire damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Lightning, Thunder

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 3d8+5 lightning and thunder damage.

At-Will

Standard

The chaos hydra makes a storm bite attack, a frostfire bite attack, and each additional attack it has gained through the growth of a head.

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 1d8+5 damage, and the target is slowed and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends both).

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 1d8+5 damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 1d8+5 damage, and the target is immobilized and takes a -2 penalty to all defenses (save ends both).

At-Will ✦ Poison

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 1d8+5 damage, and ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends).

A chaos hydra starts with two heads. When the hydra first reaches 636, 424, and 212 hit points, it grows an additional head. Roll a d4 at each increment to determine which attack the new head makes: 1-Crushing Maw, 2-Mind Bite, 3-Paralyzing Fang, or 4-Venom Tooth. A hydra can gain the same attack multiple times through this effect.
Each time a chaos hydra would become dazed or stunned, it instead loses one attack, determined randomly, while using hydra fury during its next turn. The hydra can be dazed or stunned multiple times.
A chaos hydra can make opportunity attacks against all enemies within its reach (3 squares).
